column1: #Text=Uber drivers are rated - instantly, online - by their passengers.
#Text=For really bad ratings, Uber contacts the passenger directly (via email).

#Text=Any complaint of decrepit etc. cars gets the driver suspended.On the other hand, if a drunken passenger throws up in an Uber car, all the driver needs to do is email a picture to Uber and he gets fully reimbursed.
#Text=Uber charges the amount to the drunken passenger's credit card.Try complaining about crappy taxi-cabs!
#Text=Or, if you are a cabby, try getting reimbursed from your drunken passenger.
